item.description:
The Currier Museum of Art is an internationally renowned art museum located in Manchester, NH. The Currier features European and American paintings, decorative arts, photographs and sculpture, including works by Picasso, Monet, O'Keeffe, and Wyeth, with exhibitions, tours, and performances year-round. The museum also owns Frank Lloyd Wright's Zimmerman House.

Guided tour of the museum starts at 11:30am. Visit http://www.currier.or... for more details.

Admission to the Currier Museum is free on Saturdays between 10am-12pm.

Families are welcome provided the following conditions are met:

* All rsvp's must be members of the New England Hiking Meetup. Children are considered guests since Meetup members must be age 18. All minors must have an adult present for the ENTIRE event.

* Parents and guardians are responsible for the safety and conduct of their children.

* Insure that each child is prepared in clothing and equipment. Bring extra clothing, food, and water. Little feet and hands get cold and wet.


*** Organizers reserves the right to limit the size of the participants and to cancel reservations at their discretion. ***
item.name: NH Museum Series: Currier Museum of Art
